content: I'm impressed by the instructors' backgrounds and expertise. I'm confident that their teaching approach and industry experience will help me develop practical skills in data science and business analytics. Since I have a Master's degree in Business Administration from the University of Michigan, I'm interested in learning more about how the course will help me apply data science concepts to my current role as a management consultant. Can you elaborate on how the course will help me bridge the gap between data analysis and business decision-making?
